title: Stream: Lorde – KCRW Session & Interview
body:
Having celebrated breaking into the top 40 on the Billboard charts with her single _Royals_, sixteen year old Kiwi singer **Lorde** aka Ella Yelich-O’Connor stopped by the KCRW studios for a session (including a new track Ribs) and an interview.

With a couple of shows in the US earlier this week, and a UK show set to be announced any day now, anticipation for her debut LP (out September 30) is reaching fever pitch. Check out the full session below, and the videos for _Royals_ and _The Love Club_ underneath that.

Interview / Bravado / Biting Down / Tennis Court / Interview / Ribs / The Love Club / Royals
